paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Hive Acid Transactions
**Objective:** Become familiar with using Hive Acid Transactions
**File locations:** hostname:/tmp/dc  hdfs:///data/dc
**Successful outcome:** Understanding Hive Acid Transactions
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Hive Acid Transactions 

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Hive Acid Transactions
Objective: Become familiar with using Hive Acid Transactions
File locations: hostname:/tmp/dc hdfs:///data/dc
Successful outcome: Understanding Hive Acid Transactions
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Hive Acid Transactions

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the files from source
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r /tmp/dc
mkdir /tmp/dc
wget https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/raw/master/comic-characters/dc-wikia-data.csv -O /tmp/dc/dc-wikia-data.csv

paragraphs.title: List the file
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/dc

paragraphs.title: Move the data into HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -put /tmp/dc/dc-wikia-data.csv /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chmod 777 /data/dc

msg.data: rm: `/data/dc': No such file or directory

paragraphs.title: Grant Hive access to /data/dc
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chown -R hive /data/dc

paragraphs.title: List the contents of HDFS /data/dc
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -ls /data/dc

%md
# Lab
---

%md
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid_insert **insert transcational** table to store our data.

~~~
CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid_insert ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
                        ) 
STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

msg.data:

STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

2 - Create and describe the table

paragraphs.text:
%md
Next we are going to insert the following three records into our new table **using three insert statements**
```console
1422,Batman (Bruce Wayne),\/wiki\/Batman_(Bruce_Wayne),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,3093,"1939, May",1939
23387,Superman (Clark Kent),\/wiki\/Superman_(Clark_Kent),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,2496,"1986, October",1986
1458,Green Lantern (Hal Jordan),\/wiki\/Green_Lantern_(Hal_Jordan),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Brown Eyes,Brown Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,1565,"1959, October",1959
```

paragraphs.text:
%md
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid **transactional** table to store our data.

~~~
 CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the table dc_comics_acid and create the table stored as ORC format


paragraphs.text:
%md
Type the following statement in the cell below to complete a minor compaction.
```console
ALTER TABLE dc_comics_acid COMPACT 'minor' WITH OVERWRITE TBLPROPERTIES ("tblprops.orc.compress.size"="8192");
```

msg.data:
Type the following statement in the cell below to complete a minor compaction.

ALTER TABLE dc_comics_acid COMPACT 'minor' WITH OVERWRITE TBLPROPERTIES ("tblprops.orc.compress.size"="8192");

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Solution
---

paragraphs.title: 1 - Use default and drop table dc_comics_acid_insert if it exists

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 2- Create and describe the table
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid_insert ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string) 
STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');

DESCRIBE dc_comics_acid_insert;

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the dc_comics_acid table and create the table stored as ORC format
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dc_comics_acid;

CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
                        ) 
STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');

paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials](http://hortonworks.com/tutorials/#tuts-developers) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Cloudera Community Connection (HCC)](https://community.hortonworks.com/spaces/85/data-science.html?type=question) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Cloudera Apache Spark Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/spark-overview/content/analyzing_data_with_apache_spark.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/zeppelin-overview/content/overview.html) - official Zeppelin documentation.

msg.data:
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

  1. Cloudera Apache Spark Tutorials are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
  2. Cloudera Community Connection (HCC) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
  3. Cloudera Apache Spark Docs - official Spark documentation.
  4. Cloudera Apache Zeppelin Docs - official Zeppelin documentation.
